00044 #ifndef EFF_SMALL_MAP_H_
00045 #define EFF_SMALL_MAP_H_
00046 
00047 #include "TopicCounts.h"
00048 
00049 class simple_map {
00050 private:
00051     topicCounts** buckets;
00052     int _N;
00053 
00054 public:
00055     simple_map(int N = 0x7F);
00056     virtual ~simple_map();
00057 
00058     inline int hash(topic_t key) {
00059         return key & _N;
00060     }
00061 
00062     cnt_t get(topic_t key);
00063     void put(topic_t key, cnt_t val);
00064 
00065     std::string print();
00066 
00067     void clear();
00068 };
00069 
00070 #endif /* EFF_SMALL_MAP_H_ */
